subject: Re: NEW WEBPAGE - URGENT REQUEST - Progress Impact Report
preview: Hi Lizzy,  Thanks for getting back to me. Regarding the attribution of media downloads, no, unfortunately this is not a core feature of WordPress.  The team do diligently work through the requests tha

full_threads.body:
Hi Lizzy,

Thanks for getting back to me. Regarding the attribution of media downloads, no, unfortunately this is not a core feature of WordPress.

The team do diligently work through the requests that are sent and the tracking was setup by me. The tracking is not actually a service we offer (as part of our normal operations), nor are GTM and GA tracking a normal skill of a developer. These services are generally performed by SEO or conversation rate optimisation agencies. I personally do this for MSRA given our long history with you guys.

The best thing I can do to learn from this is to have as much lead up time as possible so we can triple check that the GA is recording the links. Even if this results in the campaign being delayed by 24hrs, we would have to weigh up what the better outcome would be, a delay of 24 hrs or the potential of broken tracking. I hope that makes sense?

Keep in mind the tracking works by recording the button click, so moving forward, we can add a button, with a temporary PDF to at least see if the tag is firing and data is being saved.

If HotJar is no longer being used, I will also remove this as it can slow down load times. Trish, did you want to confirm that you are ok with that?

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire

Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath,

Ahh that's such a shame as the landing page views were so good, we were really keen to know how many converted to download the PDF.

Couldn't agree more with allowing as much time as possible for set-up and testing.

Unfortunately with this one it had to be turned around pretty quick as we only received the report itself Friday morning and sent it straight over to you guys. This was why we gave a heads up that it was coming and would need actioning quickly once we sent it over to give time to test that the results were showing up in GA. Unfortunately the tracking we requested was only partially actioned late on Friday, which resulted in the last minute completion of the request on Monday and subsequent error in tracking. In future, if your team are ever unsure of what is being requested please do not hesitate to get them to give myself or one of my team a call to clarify anything as we'd much rather that, than errors and omissions being made.

I've spoken with our campaign agency and they have asked whether our website CMS gives us a report on how many downloads we've had of a media file in general? Assuming that if there is a total media downloads section somewhere that we could attribute most downloads on the 23rd June to this report…

I'm not familiar with HotJar but perhaps Trish would have an idea about this? I would assume not though if it's not something that has ever been discussed within our team in the last 2 years.

Thanks

Lizzy

Hi Lizzy,

I can see what you mean now. The button was not tracking I'm afraid. During the last minute changes we updated the colour of the button and this removed 1 character from the tracking script. So the only stats that we are currently able to see for today are the text and image link clicks. Moving forward the button clicks are being tracked.

I'm terribly sorry about this. I wish we had more time to pre-launch to ensure the stats were registering in Analytics (not just the real-time ones as shown in the video).

Moving forward, we should aim for a pre-launch testing period of 24-48 hours to make sure the stats flow through that would be great.

The only other place there may be some stats are in HotJar… Are you still actively using this?

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi,

So when I go to the progress report page stats it says it in the screenshot below for today's date:



Thanks

Lizzy

Hi Elizabeth,

Currently Google Analytics is showing the stats from 22 June… The 6,000 visits you mention, what date are they from?

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath,

Thanks for that. I can see them now on the link you've supplied below.

So we seem to have had over 6,000 visits to the impact report landing page but hardly any download events - is this because the data is not in real time and hasn't populated yet? Or have we really had 6,000 visits to the page and less than 15 unique downloads?

Appreciate your guidance.

Thanks

Lizzy

Hi Lizzy,

They are there, please try this link: https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/#/report/content-event-events/a3323592w6254410p6464868/explorer-segmentExplorer.segmentId=analytics.eventLabel&_r.drilldown=analytics.eventCategory:Download&explorer-table.plotKeys=%5B%5D

If that doesn't work for you, let me know and I will record a video to show you where they are.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath,

Just a quick one - I can't see at the moment where the 'download' button link is showing in events (the main CTA on the page)?

Please could you advise me on where to find it in GA?

I can only see text click and image click at the moment below not button click.



Thanks

Lizzy

Hi Heath,

Great - thank you for confirming!

Fingers crossed now that everyone wants to read it!

Thanks

Lizzy

Hi Lizzy,

Ok you are all set now.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi,

No worries - fabulous! Thanks so much 😊

Lizzy

Hi Lizzy,

Apologies the initial reply didn't make it through. I'm working on this now. Give me 30mins max.

Speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Heath Maguire assigned to Jona Felizardo

full_threads.body:
Hi Lizzy, 

Confirming we have actioned the below. I have also recorded a video to demonstrate the real-time firing of the event tags:
https://www.loom.com/share/3eb691f4a5484c90bd2aabd2297fd13d

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi, Thanks for confirming. Could you confirm whether the other 2 places requested have also had the PDF download URL and event tracking added?
  • thumbnail image
  • the reference in the first sentence of the copy
There's also now two buttons showing on the page - I don't know which one is the one with the event tracking added so if you could remove the one that isn't being tracked that would be great. Below is a screenshot of the page showing the two buttons and also showing the other two places mentioned above that need the PDF hyperlink adding and tracking also added. We're due to publish the report tomorrow morning and I'm conscious it can take up to 24 hrs for tracking to appear in GA to make sure we know it's working before we send our EDM. Thanks Lizzy
